verbose_text: His initial full blood picture revealed a normal hemoglobin of 132 g/L, neutrophilia with white cell count of 15.7 x 10 9 / L, and a thrombocytosis with a platelet count of 465 x 10 9 / L. His inflammatory markers were elevated with a C-reactive protein (CRP) of 220 mg/L and erythrocyte sedimentation rate (ESR) of 90 mm/h ANA was slightly elevated at 15 IU/mL with a speckled pattern.
